inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: mild-moderate tricuspid regurgitation on echocardiographic study within 6 months prior to operation

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: able to understand the consent and able to sign informal consent

exclusion.criterion: refusal/inability to sign informal consent form
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cardiogenic shock at the time of randomization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: ST segment elevation myocardial infarction requiring Intervention within 7 days prior to randomization
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
